      • verifyHallAndColumnCorrectly

        public boolean verifyHallAndColumnCorrectly(int corridor,
                                            int column)
        Description: this is the method to verify that the corridor and column number entered by the user are correct.
        Parameters:
        corridor - int, it represents the corridor number of the mini room
        column - int, it represents the column number of the mini room
        Returns:
        out boolean, if out = true the corridor and column number entered by the user are correct else the corridor or column are not correct.

      • veryfyIfTheMiniRoomIsRented

        public boolean veryfyIfTheMiniRoomIsRented(int corridor,
                                           int column)
        Description: this is the method to verify if a mini room is rented
        Parameters:
        corridor - int, it represents the corridor number of the mini room
        column - int, it represents the column number of the mini room
        Returns:
        out boolean, if out = true the mini room is rented else the mini room is not rented.

        Description: this is the method to find the infortmation of a mini room
        Parameters:
        corridor - int, it represents the corridor number of the mini room
        column - int, it represents the column number of the mini room
        Returns:
        out String, it represents the information of the mini room or a message when the corridor or column number are not correct.

        Description: this is the method to add a server to a mini room.
        Parameters:
        corridor - int,
        column - int,
        cacheMemory - double,
        amountProcessors - int,
        ramMemory - double,
        amountDisks - int,
        diskCapacity - double,
        optionPro - int, it represents the brand of the processor, if optionPro = 1 , the brand of the processor is AMD, if optionPro = 2, th brand of the processor is INTEL.
